item.title: Scar form troubles
item.dc:creator: @omgh4x0rz omgh4x0rz
item.description:
@omgh4x0rz wrote:

this is your problem
frmDesign.Visible := True;

change it to frmDesign.visible:=false; //it will stay visible now

Read full topic

item.title: Scar form troubles
item.dc:creator: @doomsday doomsday
item.description:
@doomsday wrote:

Here is your problem.

procedure ShowFormModal;
begin
  frmDesign.ShowModal;
end;

procedure SafeShowFormModal;
var
  v: TVariantArray;
begin
  setarraylength(V, 0);
  ThreadSafeCall('ShowFormModal', v);
end;

put these into your script. then put this into your man script/

SafeShowFormModal;

Read full topic

item.title: Scar form troubles
item.dc:creator: @Chrisface Chrisface
item.description:
@Chrisface wrote:

Of you want to do it until the text in Edit1 = t then you have to use the line below. As for the other problem… i can’t be bothered looking through all the code

“Until( t = Edit1.Text )”

Read full topic

item.title: Scar form troubles
item.dc:creator: @bobert5696 bobert5696
item.description:
@bobert5696 wrote:

heres my script with a form, and there are 2 problems:

[code]program Teleporter;
{.include SRL/Srl.scar}

var
frmDesign : TForm;
Edit1 : TEdit;
Ok : TButton;
t : integer;

procedure InitForm;
begin
frmDesign := CreateForm;
frmDesign.Left := 250;
frmDesign.Top := 114;
frmDesign.Width := 190;
frmDesign.Height := 126;
frmDesign.Caption := ‘frmDesign’;
frmDesign.Color := clBtnFace;
frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
frmDesign.Visible := True;
frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
Edit1 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit1.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit1.Left := 32;
Edit1.Top := 11;
Edit1.Width := 121;
Edit1.Height := 21;
Edit1.TabOrder := 8;
Edit1.Text := ‘Number of Teleports’;
Ok := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Ok.Parent := frmDesign;
Ok.Left := 46;
Ok.Top := 56;
Ok.Width := 75;
Ok.Height := 25;
Ok.Caption := ‘Ok’;
Ok.TabOrder := 9;
end;
procedure SafeInitForm;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘InitForm’, v);
end;

Procedure Tab;
Begin
Writeln( 'You are using: Auto Teleporter Writen by bobert5696 and edited by Surajd ’ );
Mouse(739, 187, 10, 10, true); // Magic Tab
Wait(1000 + random( 250 ));
end;

Procedure Click;
Begin
Mouse(635, 299, 5, 5, true); //Cammy Teleport
t:= t + 1
Wait( 3000 + random( 250 ));
end;

Begin
SafeInitForm;
Tab;
Repeat
Click;
Until( t = Edit1 )
Writeln( 'Thanks for using Auto Teleporter by bobert5696 and edited by Surajd =D ’ );
End.[/code]

1st is that the form stays for about a tenth of a sec, how can i make it stay until a value is entered into the text box, and OK is hit?
2nd: i get an error when running, and im not sure why, a "type mismatch error on line 71, line 71 says:

“Until( t = Edit1 )”
any help you can give is appreciated, im trying to learn scar, and this is basically my first script, probably a little advanced to use forms, but knowledge is power, and i like power

Read full topic
